mapper.select: select DISTINCT designer_id as user_id, designer as name from t_style s where company_code = #{companyCode} AND del_flag = '0' and designer_id !='' and designer_id is not null
SELECT old_design_no as design_no, brand, brand_name, year, year_name, season, season_name FROM t_style where id = #{styleId}

SELECT DISTINCT ts.id as styleId, ts.prod_category1st as prodCategory1st, ts.prod_category1st_name as prodCategory1stName, ts.prod_category as prodCategory, ts.prod_category_name as prodCategoryName, ts.prod_category2nd as prodCategory2nd, ts.prod_category2nd_name as prodCategory2ndName, ts.band_code as bandCode, ts.band_name as bandName, tfv.field_id as fieldId, tfv.field_explain as fieldExplain, tfv.val as var, tfv.val_name as varName FROM t_style ts LEFT JOIN t_field_val tfv ON ts.id = tfv.foreign_id AND ts.del_flag='0' WHERE ts.del_flag='0'
